2 - JAL Profile
About Us
3 - JAL Profile
JAL, a subsidiary of GASCO, has specialized in transportation and logistics for over 60 years and now aims to become a market leader in end-to-end logistics solutions.
JAL offers its services across the Kingdom and the Middle East through a comprehensive fleet of modern carriers and a highly trained, professional team, focusing on developing advanced technologies that enhance efficiency and safety in transportation operations. Additionally, JAL maintains a strong presence with a network of branches, warehouses, workshops, and yards across the region.
Committed to excellence, JAL leverages best-in-class assets and a highly motivated, well-trained team to provide an exceptional customer experience and achieve the highest standards of quality.
4 - JAL Profile
Vision
To be a market leader in providing best-in-class, end-to-end logistics solutions in KSA and beyond, ensuring the highest levels of reliability, efficiency, and
sustainability while being the preferred partner for our customers.


Mission

Providing comprehensive services and solutions in the land logistics sector, leveraging our deep-rooted experience and unwavering commitment to the highest standards of quality, efficiency, and safety, to earn our customers› trust and become their preferred partner in meeting their needs.
